title: Automaker CEO Elon Musk Strips UAW Twitter Verification as Union Strikes Against Big Three
description:
A UAW official said the union’s paid Twitter account was verified until Friday morning, hours after the strike began.

The post Automaker CEO Elon Musk Strips UAW Twitter Verification as Union Strikes Against Big Three appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Mahmoud Abbas Holocaust Controversy Spotlights Deep Disillusion With Palestinian Authority
description:
Thirty years after the Oslo Accords, Palestinians question whether the pseudo-government borne from the peace process can — and should — survive.

The post Mahmoud Abbas Holocaust Controversy Spotlights Deep Disillusion With Palestinian Authority appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Naomi Klein on Conspiracy Culture and “the Mirror World”
description:
Naomi Klein unpacks the world of conspiracy theories, rising fascism, and her new book, “Doppelganger: A Trip Into the Mirror World.”

The post Naomi Klein on Conspiracy Culture and “the Mirror World” appeared first on The Intercept.
